posts.title: Foundations, not silos
posts.summary: A website model where portfolio items and blog posts are one stream with different views.
posts.contentHtml: A resilient content architecture starts by avoiding duplicate systems. Everything is a post; views do the segmentation.

posts.title: Spec-first front-end planning
posts.summary: Using a tracked matrix to adopt modern HTML and CSS features intentionally.
posts.contentHtml: Instead of random feature usage, maintain a deliberate standards matrix with compatibility notes and test requirements.

posts.title: Unified stream portfolio filtering
posts.summary: Portfolio view can be implemented by filtering the same post list by a stable tag.
posts.contentHtml: When portfolio is a filter, publishing workflows stay simple and navigation remains coherent.
